original_title: The Biggest Loser Workout - Boot Camp
overview: Just like the contestants on NBC's hit show, you too can rev up your fat-burning furnace and experience dramatic weight loss in less time. Join "The Biggest Loser" trainer, Bob, and show contestant winners and finalists for a 6-8 week program that beats the bulge one intensity level at a time.
title: The Biggest Loser Workout - Boot Camp
